author: Msmash No-Relief-In-Sight Dept
title: Antarctic Temperatures Rise 10C Above Average in Near Record Heatwave
text: [](//news.slashdot.org/index2.pl?fhfilter=earth) [Antarctic Temperatures Rise 10C Above Average in Near Record Heatwave](//news.slashdot.org/story/24/08/02/0814205/antarctic-temperatures-rise-10c-above-average-in-near-record-heatwave) [124](//news.slashdot.org/story/24/08/02/0814205/antarctic-temperatures-rise-10c-above-average-in-near-record-heatwave#comments) [soared an average of 10C above normal](https://www.theguardian.com/world/article/2024/aug/01/antarctic-temperatures-rise-10c-above-average-in-near-record-heatwave)over the past month, in what has been described as a near record heatwave. From a report: While temperatures remain below zero on the polar land mass, which is shrouded in darkness at this time of year, the depths of southern hemisphere winter, temperatures have reportedly reached 28C above expectations on some days. The globe has experienced 12 months of record warmth, with temperatures consistently exceeding the 1.5C rise above preindustrial levels that has been touted as the limit to avoiding the worst of climate breakdown. Michael Dukes, the director of forecasting at MetDesk, said that while individual daily high temperatures were surprising, far more significant was the average rise over the month. Climate scientists' models have long predicted that the most significant effects of anthropogenic climate change would be on polar regions, "and this is a great example of that," he said. "Usually you can't just look at one month for a climate trend but it is right in line with what models predict," Dukes added. "In Antarctica generally that kind of warming in the winter and continuing in to summer months can lead to collapsing of the ice sheets."

author: vuldb.com
title: CVE-2025-8987 | SourceCodester COVID 19 Testing Management System 1.0 /test-details.php remark sql injection
text:
Summary
A vulnerability was found in SourceCodester COVID 19 Testing Management System 1.0. It has been declared as critical. This vulnerability affects unknown code of the file /test-details.php. The manipulation of the argument remark leads to sql injection.
This vulnerability was named CVE-2025-8987. The attack can be initiated remotely. Furthermore, there is an exploit available.
Details
A vulnerability was found in SourceCodester COVID 19 Testing Management System 1.0. It has been classified as critical. This affects some unknown processing of the file /test-details.php. The manipulation of the argument remark
with an unknown input leads to a sql injection vulnerability. CWE is classifying the issue as CWE-89. The product constructs all or part of an SQL command using externally-influenced input from an upstream component, but it does not neutralize or incorrectly neutralizes special elements that could modify the intended SQL command when it is sent to a downstream component. This is going to have an impact on confidentiality, integrity, and availability.
It is possible to read the advisory at github.com. This vulnerability is uniquely identified as CVE-2025-8987. The exploitability is told to be easy. It is possible to initiate the attack remotely. No form of authentication is needed for exploitation. Technical details and a public exploit are known. The attack technique deployed by this issue is T1505 according to MITRE ATT&CK.
The exploit is shared for download at github.com. It is declared as proof-of-concept. By approaching the search of inurl:test-details.php it is possible to find vulnerable targets with Google Hacking.
There is no information about possible countermeasures known. It may be suggested to replace the affected object with an alternative product.
See VDB-306508, VDB-311605 and VDB-313291 for similar entries.

title: Cofepris alerta por falsificaci√≥n y venta ilegal de medicamentos oncol√≥gicos
text:
La Comisi√≥n Federal para la Protecci√≥n contra Riesgos Sanitarios (Cofepris) emiti√≥ una alerta sanitaria sobre la falsificaci√≥n y comercializaci√≥n ilegal de Endoxan, Darzalex y Vectibix, tres medicamentos que son de uso oncol√≥gico.
A trav√©s de un comunicado, la Cofepris inform√≥ que la empresa Baxter identific√≥ la distribuci√≥n en M√©xico del producto Endoxan 1g (ciclofosfamida) en presentaci√≥n 1 vial de 50 ml, polvo para soluci√≥n, con n√∫mero de lote 2C266E y caducidad en febrero 2025, el cual fue destinado exclusivamente para comercializaci√≥n en Centroam√©rica.
Publicidad En tanto que Janssen-Cilag inform√≥ que los lotes DDP1255 para el producto Darzalex 400 mg/20ml, as√≠ como EEF2466 y HHT5917 para Darzalex 100 mg/5ml, no se encuentran en su listado, por lo que se determin√≥ su falsificaci√≥n.
Te puede interesar: M√©xico Cofepris aprueba comercializaci√≥n de vacunas covid de Pfizer y Moderna Cofepris inform√≥ tambi√©n que el lote MBS2H04 de Darzalex 400 mg/20ml, est√° destinado s√≥lo para el mercado colombiano, mientras que el lote LHS2649 fue desviado de la cadena de suministro original.
Publicidad Lo √∫ltimo 2023, el a√±o que se marc√≥ un nuevo r√©cord en homicidios para un sexenio Cinco gr√°ficas que muestran la crisis migratoria en M√©xico y Estados Unidos D√≠as festivos 2024: ¬øcu√°ndo son las fechas de descanso obligatorio? Publicidad La empresa Amgen M√©xico tambi√©n identific√≥ la comercializaci√≥n del producto Vectibix (panitumumab) 100mg/5mL, con textos en idioma ingl√©s, con n√∫mero de lote 323473, caducidad abril 2024; 322580 y 11291 con fecha l√≠mite abril 2023, de los cuales no se reconoce la importaci√≥n, distribuci√≥n ni comercializaci√≥n.
La Cofepris detall√≥ as√≠ que estos productos representan un riesgo para la salud, debido a que se desconocen sus condiciones de fabricaci√≥n y almacenamiento, por lo que su seguridad, calidad y eficacia no est√°n garantizadas.
Por ello recomend√≥ que en caso de contar con alguno de los medicamentos Endoxan, Darzalex y Vectibix con los n√∫meros de lote mencionados, acuda con un profesional de la salud para que indique el tratamiento a seguir.
Para saber m√°s M√©xico Campa√±a de vacunaci√≥n covid 2023, una batalla con reactivos sin actualizar En caso de haber presentado cualquier reacci√≥n adversa o malestar por el suministro de dichos productos, debe reportarlo en el siguiente enlace en l√≠nea o al correo: farmacovigilancia@cofepris.gob.mx
Asimismo se exhort√≥ a la poblaci√≥n y a personal m√©dico para que, en caso de identificar los productos con las caracter√≠sticas antes se√±aladas, evite adquirirlos, y si cuenta con informaci√≥n sobre la posible comercializaci√≥n, realice la denuncia sanitaria correspondiente en gob.mx/Cofepris .
#CofeprisTeProtege al alertar por falsificaci√≥n y comercializaci√≥n ilegal de medicamentos oncol√≥gicos
üëâüèº https://t.co/cjN9OlZiOR pic.twitter.com/5YxjyF4YEE
‚Äî COFEPRIS (@COFEPRIS) December 28, 2023
Lo m√°s visto La actriz Silvia Pinal y su paso por la pol√≠tica mexicana Caravana de migrantes ser√° tema en la reuni√≥n entre AMLO, Blinken y Mayorkas El Tribunal de Michigan rechaza sacar a Trump de la papeleta electoral Coca-Cola y Rappi se unen para darle una segunda vida a los envases con un clic Publicidad Publicidad Tags Comisi√≥n Federal para la Protecci√≥n contra Riesgos Sanitarios C√°ncer Secretar√≠a de Salud Recomendaciones M√©xico Cofepris emite alerta por falso medicamento contra el c√°ncer presidencia AMLO admite retraso de medicamentos y respalda a padres de ni√±os con c√°ncer M√°s acerca del autor: Expansi√≥n Pol√≠tica @ExpPolitica Newsletter

author: @Region8News
title: Woman facing animal abuse charges after bringing dyed pink kitten to animal hospital
text: Woman facing animal abuse charges after bringing dyed pink kitten to animal hospital PORTLAND, Ore. ( [KPTV](https://www.kptv.com/2023/12/28/portland-woman-arrested-after-bringing-dyed-pink-kitten-animal-hospital/)/Gray News) - Oregon authorities say a Portland woman has been arrested and charged with animal abuse after she brought her kitten to an area animal hospital barely responsive and dyed pink. According to authorities, Elizabeth Zurcher-Wood brought the kitten into the Dove Lewis Animal Hospital on Dec. 12. The animal was suffering from hypothermia and in shock. Zurcher-Wood reportedly told a veterinarian at the animal hospital that her cat was sick. So, she cleaned her with Windex glass cleaner, Spic and Span household cleaner and rubbing alcohol. The veterinarian said the woman seemed to not understand that the chemicals she used were toxic to the cat. Zurcher-Wood was taken into custody the following week and charged with two counts of animal abuse. This is not the first time Zurcher-Wood has run into legal troubles. Police said was previously arrested after trying to kidnap a child while wielding a machete. According to the [Oregon Humane Society](https://www.oregonhumane.org/), the kitten is now healthy and is currently with a foster family. Copyright 2023 KPTV via Gray Media Group, Inc. All rights reserved.

author: Cristina Freitas
title: Uma das maiores empresas de Arcos de Valdevez encerra no final do ano e deixa 350 trabalhadores no desemprego - SIC Not√≠cias
text:
Um das maiores empresas de Arcos de Valdevez vai encerrar no final do ano. Com 350 pessoas no desemprego, a preocupa√ß√£o √© grande pelo impacto que vai ter na regi√£o. Na Coindu, que produz componentes para o setor autom√≥vel, trabalham v√°rias fam√≠lias.
Antes do turno, F√°tima d√° uma ajuda ao pai numa pequena mercearia em Salvador de Padreiro, Arcos de Valdevez. N√£o quer falar do fecho da Coindu, empresa onde est√° h√° 22 anos.
O marido saiu h√° v√°rios meses quando a f√°brica despediu uma centena de trabalhadores. Agora, ficam os dois no desemprego.
O irm√£o de F√°tima trabalha na zona de expedi√ß√£o. J√° tinha sido despedido em 2008, mas regressou.
Segundo a administra√ß√£o, a falta de encomendas e a concorr√™ncia feroz do Norte de Africa levaram a deste desfecho.
O encerramento da Coindu no final do ano vai deixar 350 pessoas sem emprego. Muitos temem pelo impacto que vai ter no concelho.
Apesar dos tempos de incerteza, a Associa√ß√£o Comercial e Industrial acredita que h√° um caminho que pode ser feito.
O presidente da autarquia j√° pediu ajuda ao Governo e apela a que outros empres√°rios da regi√£o aproveitem esta m√£o de obra.
